column2: Testimony of Solitary Eye Witness (11 years of age) was not
Testimony  of  Solitary  Eye  Witness  was  contradicted  by  the
so-called  Dying Declaration made by the deceased.
When  there  are  ample  opportunities  for  the  prosecution  to
record a statement from the child on the day of the incident,
they have failed to do so. Therefore, the possibility of tutoring
the child witness cannot be totally ruled out.
Behaviour of the child witness is not natural.
